thread.title: At least ten people were killed in an Israeli attack on a crowd of Palestinians at an aid distribution site in the Gaza Strip, Al-Jazeera reported.
thread.title_full: At least ten people were killed in an Israeli attack on a crowd of Palestinians at an aid distribution site in the Gaza Strip, Al-Jazeera reported.

title: At least ten people were killed in an Israeli attack on a crowd of Palestinians at an aid distribution site in the Gaza Strip, Al-Jazeera reported.
text:
At least ten people were killed in an Israeli attack on a crowd of Palestinians at an aid distribution site in the Gaza Strip, Al-Jazeera reported.
At least ten people were killed in an Israeli attack on a crowd of Palestinians at an aid distribution site in the Gaza Strip, Al-Jazeera reported.
According to the broadcaster, the incident took place near the Netzarim Corridor in central Gaza. Some 200 people suffered injuries. Al Jazeera also reported massive air and artillery strikes on the southern part of the enclave, including the city of Khan Yunis.
